meanings.definition: In a clearheaded manner; with a clear mind.
meanings.sent1: She approached the problem clearheadedly, analyzing it logically.
meanings.sent2: He always makes decisions clearheadedly, without letting emotions cloud his judgment.
meanings.sent3: Even in the chaos of the party, she navigated the room clearheadedly.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts moved clearheadedly through the clutter of information.
meanings.sent5: The instructions were laid out so clearly that she followed them clearheadedly.
